body_html:
This is ready for another review pass.

@rjweiss r? on the documentation for the new uptake data we're reporting to telemetry: https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/818/files#diff-40f88927acb0373dd06756244c2ee0ae

There aren't any examples of how to document this kind of data (the histogram is already defined, but accepts generic data from updaters) so I aimed to describe for users the nature of the data we're collection rather than the specific values in the main packet (which rely on Firefox code that Normandy doesn't control).

@georgf Sunah said I should ask one of the telemetry client folks about sending this uptake data, and I figured since you were on the original uptake bug, you'd be a good person to glance over this. f?

@leplatrem I can't assign you since you're not part of the Mozilla Github org, but if you want to double-check my usage of uptake telemetry here, that'd be rad. :D
